editor:
from library import record, heading, show_results

think(0)
FAIL = False
OK = True
reeborg = default_robot()

heading("Any failing tests appear above this heading.")
record("This is not a failing test! Just confirming that recording works", FAIL)
def turn(n=1):
    for i in range(n):
        turn_left()

# start at random position and orientation
# test way to orient
while not is_facing_north():
    turn()

# hitting wall properly recorded
turn()  # face wall
try:
    move()
    record("Hit wall", FAIL)
except ReeborgError:
    record("Hit wall", OK)

# facing left wall; right should be clear
try:
    assert right_is_clear()
    record("1. tested right_is_clear()", OK)
except AssertionError:
    record("1. tested right_is_clear()", FAIL)

turn()
# facing south wall; right should NOT be clear
try:
    assert right_is_clear()
    record("2. tested right_is_clear()", FAIL)
except AssertionError:
    record("2. tested right_is_clear()", OK)


# moving towards (1, 1)
while front_is_clear():
    move()

try:
    assert reeborg.body.x == 1
    assert reeborg.body.y == 1
    record("At (1,1)", OK)
except ReeborgError:
    record("At (1,1)", FAIL)

turn()

items = ['token', 'triangle', 'square', 'strawberry',
         'banana', 'orange', 'apple', 'leaf',
         'dandelion', 'carrot', 'tulip', 'daisy', 'star']
for item in items:
    move()
    take(item)

turn()
move()
turn()
while front_is_clear():
    move()
turn(2)

for item in items:
    move()
    put(item)

# Trying different terrains
turn()
move()  # on gravel
try:
    move()  # on ice, will keep going
    record("Caught water", FAIL)
except ReeborgError:
    record("Caught water", OK)
    

try:
    move() 
    record("Caught mud", FAIL)
except ReeborgError:
    record("Caught mud", OK)  

 

move()  # on grass; safe
try:
    move()  # on brick, will keep going
    record("Caught brick", FAIL)
except ReeborgError:
    record("Caught brick", OK)   

turn()  # should always be safe
move()

try:
    assert reeborg.body.x == 13
    assert reeborg.body.y == 8
    record("At (13, 8)", OK)
except ReeborgError:
    record("At (13, 8)", FAIL)

turn()
for i in range(4):
    try:
        move()
        record("Caught fence", FAIL)
    except ReeborgError:
        record("Caught fence", OK)
        turn(3)
        move()
        turn()

try:
    move()
    record("Push box in water", OK)
except ReeborgError:
    record("Push box in water", FAIL)
try:
    move()
    record("Box now bridge", OK)
except ReeborgError:
    record("Box now bridge", FAIL)
try:
    move()
    record("move over old bridge", OK)
except ReeborgError:
    record("move over old bridge", FAIL)
try:
    move()
    record("Push box to goal", OK)
except ReeborgError:
    record("Push box to goal", FAIL)
turn(3)
move()

try:
    build_wall()
    record("Building wall", OK)
except ReeborgError:
    record("Building wall", FAIL)

turn()
move()
turn(3)
move()
turn(3)
move()
for item in ["wall", "brick", "fence1", "fence2", 
             "fence3", "fence4"]:
    try:
        move()
        move()
        move()
        record("Cannot push box into: "+item, FAIL)
    except ReeborgError:
        record("Cannot push box into: "+item, OK)
        turn(2)
        move()
        move()
        turn(3)
        move()
        turn(3)

while front_is_clear():
    move()

turn(3)
move()
turn()
for item in ['mud', 'grass', 'gravel', 'ice']:
    try:
         move()
         turn(2)
         move()
         turn()
         move()
         turn()
         record("Can push box onto: "+item, OK)
    except ReeborgError:
         record("Can push box onto: "+item, FAIL)

turn(3)
while not at_goal():
    move()

show_results()
